text: Really sweet lady who will give advice on how best to mend your outfit. I brought a coat that had a torn inner lining, she assessed it, gave me a quote and ask me to consider if it's worth fixing or better to buy a new coat. Very honest with no hard sell :)

What sets these old tailoring shops apart is the personalized experience they offer. Unlike the sterile atmosphere of modern retail, here, every customer is treated as an individual with unique preferences and needs. The process of crafting a garment is a collaborative effort, with the tailor taking the time to understand your style, measuring meticulously, and offering expert advice that only comes from years of honing one's skills.
Very good workmanship. Hard to get nowadays. Mdm ho will listen to your needs n she can give good advice. Been there afew times, trust her on my expensive dresses which not all can alter.
Very good and fast service. Brought 10 clothes at once to her shop last week and she managed to alter all of it in 3 hours. Another shop I went to took 1 day to alter 8 clothes. Very Recommend!
Great service provided by mdm ho! Had a few shirts altered and mdm ho did it exactly how i wished within a day. Recommended!
